short_summary: Public Health Agency of Canada located in Winnipeg, Manitoba has a requirement for the supply and installation of one (1)Automatic microbiological media preparator for delivery by 2024-03-31.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2024-05-12 at 02:00 PM EDT.
